synopsis: Now, in the era we live in, we are surrounded by a variety of ideas, and each of these ideas and thoughts is given to us in many ways.  The Art and The Media play an important role as two important tools for forcing and pushing information, but these two important tools go so far as to get something that takes their lives and lose control of humanity and is nothing but The Ruin.
